Booby Trap.card_desc: [Sensor Drone] Your Sensor Drones explode dealing 600 damage and knocking back when an enemy is within 20ft.

Contingency.card_desc: [Deflector Shield] Increase Deflector Shield's Health by {scale=200|200}.

Controlling Nature.card_desc: [Precision Sights] Reduce the Cooldown of Sensor Drone by {scale=0.06|0.06}s for every enemy hit while Precision Sights is active.

Crack the Whip.card_desc: [Sensor Drone] Gain {scale=6|6}% Lifesteal against enemies Revealed by Sensor Drone.

Eyes on the Prize.card_desc: [Precision Sights] Reduce your weapon recoil by {scale=20|20}% while using Precision Sights.

Hidden Reserves.card_desc: [Precision Sights] Every weapon shot made while Precision Sights is active has an {scale=8|8}% chance to not consume Ammo.

Informants.card_desc: [Sensor Drone] Heal for {scale=100|100} after getting a Killing Blow on an enemy Revealed by your Sensor Drone.

Joyless Eyes.card_desc: [Sensor Drone] Increase the range at which Sensor Drone Reveals targets by {scale=10|10}%.

Lightweight Alloy.card_desc: [Precision Sights] Bring up Precision Sights {scale=15|15}% faster.

Nowhere to Hide.card_desc: [Sensor Drone] Sensor Drone's Reveal persists for {scale=1|1}s after an enemy leaves its Reveal range.

Opportunity in Chaos.card_desc: [Weapon] After firing continuously for 2s, gain 20% increased damage.

Plans Within Plans.card_desc: [Deflector Shield] Heal for {scale=20|20} every 1s while Deflector Shield is active.

Scapegoat.card_desc: [Deflector Shield] While Deflector Shield is active {scale=10|10}% of damage dealt to you is instead dealt to the Shield.

Suspect Everyone.card_desc: [Armor] You and your deployables take 20% less damage from enemies revealed by your Sensor Drone.

Unchecked Ambition.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy with a weapon shot has a {scale=12|12}% chance to not consume Ammo.

Unfair Advantage.card_desc: [Deflector Shield] Increase the duration of Deflector Shield by {scale=1|1}s.

Augenmerk.card_desc: [Präzisionsblick] Reduziert den Waffenrückstoß während Präzisionsblick um {scale=20|20}%.

Beherrschende Natur.card_desc: [Präzisionsblick] Waffentreffer während Präzisionsblick reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Sensordrohne um {scale=0.06|0.06}s.

Chaostage.card_desc: [Waffe] Feuerst du 2s lang durchgehend, verursachst du danach 20% mehr Schaden.

Freudlose Augen.card_desc: [Sensordrohne] Vergrößert die Offenbarungsreichweite von Sensordrohne um {scale=10|10}%.

Generalverdacht.card_desc: [Rüstung] Du und deine Vorrichtungen erleiden 20% weniger Schaden von Gegnern, die von der Sensordrohne offenbart wurden.

Informanten.card_desc: [Sensordrohne] Tötest du einen von deiner Sensordrohne offenbarten Gegner, wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Kaltes Herz.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Kein Entkommen.card_desc: [Sensordrohne] Verlässt ein Gegner den Sichtbereich der Sensordrohne, wird er trotzdem noch {scale=1|1}s lang offenbart.

Peitschenhieb.card_desc: [Sensordrohne] Gewährt gegen von Sensordrohne offenbarte Gegner {scale=6|6}% Lebensraub.

Plan und Gegenplan.card_desc: [Deflektorschild] Während Deflektorschild aktiv ist, wirst du {scale=20|20} LP pro Sekunde geheilt.

Sprengfalle.card_desc: [Sensordrohne] Befindet sich ein Gegner innerhalb von 20 Einheiten deiner Sensordrohne, explodiert sie. Sie verursacht 600 Schaden und stößt den Gegner zurück.

S\u00fcndenbock.card_desc: [Deflektorschild] Während Deflektorschild aktiv ist, werden {scale=10|10}% des von dir erlittenen Schadens stattdessen vom Schild absorbiert.

Unfairer Vorteil.card_desc: [Deflektorschild] Erhöht die Dauer von Deflektorschild um {scale=1|1}s.

Ungehemmte Ambition.card_desc: [Waffe] Waffentreffer besitzen eine {scale=12|12}%ige Chance, keine Munition zu verbrauchen.

Verborgene Reserven.card_desc: [Präzisionsblick] Schüsse während Präzisionsblick besitzen eine {scale=8|8}%ige Chance, keine Munition zu verbrauchen.

Alliage l\u00e9ger.card_desc: [Mires de précision] La vitesse d'activation de Mires de précision augmente de {scale=15|15}%.

Ambition d\u00e9mesur\u00e9e.card_desc: [Arme] Chaque tir réussi a {scale=12|12}% de chances de n'utiliser aucune munition.

Au milieu du chaos.card_desc: [Arme] Après 2s de tir continu, vos dégâts augmentent de 20%.

Avantage d\u00e9loyal.card_desc: [Bouclier déflecteur] Le Bouclier déflecteur dure {scale=1|1}s de plus.

Bouc \u00e9missaire.card_desc: [Bouclier déflecteur] Pendant Bouclier déflecteur, {scale=10|10}% des dégâts que vous devriez subir sont redirigés vers le bouclier.

Bouch\u00e9es doubles.card_desc: [Drone capteur] Vous avez {scale=6|6}% de drain de vie contre les ennemis révélés par le Drone capteur.

Cache-cache infernal.card_desc: [Drone capteur] Le Drone capteur révèle {scale=1|1}s de plus les ennemis qui quittent son champ de vision.

Contingence.card_desc: [Bouclier déflecteur] Le Bouclier déflecteur a {scale=200|200} PV de plus.

Contr\u00f4le de la nature.card_desc: [Mires de précision] Le temps de recharge de Drone capteur diminue de {scale=0.06|0.06}s par ennemi touché pendant Mires de précision.

Indics.card_desc: [Drone capteur] Vous regagnez {scale=100|100} PV quand vous exécutez un ennemi révélé par le Drone capteur.

Manigances.card_desc: [Bouclier déflecteur] Le Bouclier déflecteur vous rend {scale=20|20} PV par seconde.

Munitions runiques.card_desc: [Arme] Vous avez {scale=5|5}% de drain de vie.

Objectif en vue.card_desc: [Mires de précision] Le recul diminue de {scale=20|20}% pendant Mires de précision.

Objet pi\u00e9g\u00e9.card_desc: [Drone capteur] Quand un ennemi s'approche à moins de 20 unités du Drone capteur, ce dernier explose en infligeant 600 dégâts et en le repoussant.

R\u00e9serves cach\u00e9es.card_desc: [Mires de précision] Chaque tir pendant Mires de précision a {scale=8|8}% de chances de n'utiliser aucune munition.

Suspicion maximale.card_desc: [Armure] Les ennemis révélés par le Drone capteur infligent 20% de dégâts en moins à vous et vos déployables.

Un train d'avance.card_desc: [Armure] Votre vitesse hors combat augmente de {scale=6|6}%.

Vision lointaine.card_desc: [Drone capteur] Le rayon de détection du Drone capteur augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

\u4e0d\u516c\u4f18\u52bf.card_desc: [防弹屏障] 屏障持续时间增加{scale=1|1}秒

\u519b\u706b\u50a8\u5907.card_desc: [精确瞄准] 使用机瞄时有{scale=8|8}%的几率不会消耗弹药

\u538b\u6291\u672c\u80fd.card_desc: [精确瞄准] 使用机瞄命中敌人时会减少探测守卫{scale=0.06|0.06}秒的冷却时间

\u53ef\u8d81\u4e4b\u673a.card_desc: [武器] 持续开火2秒后造成的伤害会提高20%

\u610f\u5916\u4e8b\u6545.card_desc: [防弹屏障] 增加屏障{scale=200|200}点生命值

\u626c\u97ad\u5c31\u7eea.card_desc: [探测守卫] 攻击被守卫探测过的敌人时，可以获得{scale=6|6}%的生命偷取

\u65e0\u5904\u53ef\u9003.card_desc: [探测守卫] 当敌人脱离守卫的侦测范围后，显形效果仍然持续{scale=1|1}秒

\u66ff\u7f6a\u7f8a.card_desc: [防弹屏障] 你所受到的伤害值的{scale=10|10}%会转为对屏障的伤害

\u672a\u77e5\u7684\u91ce\u5fc3.card_desc: [武器] 武器命中后有{scale=12|12}%的几率不会消耗弹药

\u6f20\u7136\u4e4b\u773c.card_desc: [探测守卫] 守卫的探测范围增加{scale=10|10}%

\u7591\u5fc3\u91cd\u91cd.card_desc: [探测守卫] 被探测守卫显形过的敌人对你和你的部署物造成的伤害减少20%

\u7b26\u6587\u5f39\u836f.card_desc: [武器] 对敌方护盾造成的伤害会有{scale=5|5}%转化为自身生命值

\u7cd6\u8863\u70ae\u5f39.card_desc: [探测守卫] 探测守卫会在敌人接近20码时自动爆炸，造成500点伤害

\u7d27\u76ef\u6218\u5229\u54c1.card_desc: [精确瞄准] 使用机瞄时武器后坐力减少{scale=20|20}%.

\u7ebf\u4eba.card_desc: [探测守卫] 击杀被守卫探测过的敌人会回复{scale=100|100}点生命值

\u8ba1\u4e2d\u8ba1.card_desc: [防弹屏障] 开启屏障时，每秒恢复{scale=20|20}点生命值

\u8f7b\u91cf\u5408\u91d1.card_desc: [精确瞄准] 切换至机瞄的速度提高{scale=15|15}%

\u9ebb\u6728\u4e4b\u5fc3.card_desc: [护甲] 最大生命值增加{scale=50|50}点

Aleaci\u00f3n liviana.card_desc: [Mira de precisión] Mira de precisión se activa un {scale=15|15}% más rápido.

Audacia desenfrenada.card_desc: [Arma] Cada disparo de arma que alcance a un enemigo tiene un {scale=12|12}% de posibilidad de no consumir munición.

Cazabobos.card_desc: [Sensor dron] Si un enemigo está dentro de un rango de 20 unidades de tu Sensor dron, este explota infligiendo 600 PS de daño y repeliendo.

Chivo expiatorio.card_desc: [Escudo deflector] Mientras Escudo deflector está activo, un {scale=10|10}% del daño dirigido hacia a ti es infligido al escudo.

Contingencia.card_desc: [Escudo deflector] Aumenta los PS de Escudo deflector en {scale=200|200} PS.

Controlando la Naturaleza.card_desc: [Mira de precisión] Se reduce la recarga de Sensor dron en {scale=0.06|0.06}s por cada enemigo alcanzado mientras esté activa Mira de precisión.

Coraz\u00f3n entumecido.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Informantes.card_desc: [Sensor dron] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS al asestar un golpe de gracia a un enemigo revelado por Sensor dron.

Intenta Esconderte.card_desc: [Sensor dron] La revelación de Sensor dron dura {scale=1|1}s más después de que el enemigo salga fuera del rango de visión.

Munici\u00f3n r\u00fanica.card_desc: [Arma] Obtienes un {scale=5|5}% de robo de vida.

Ojos en el Premio.card_desc: [Mira de precisión] Se reduce el retroceso del arma un {scale=20|20}% mientras usas Mira de precisión.

Oportunidad en el caos.card_desc: [Arma] Después de disparar de manera continua durante 2s, obtienes un 20% de aumento de daño.

Planeaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Escudo deflector] Te curas {scale=20|20} PS cada 1s mientras Escudo deflector está activo.

Reservas Ocultas.card_desc: [Mira de precisión] Cada disparo realizado con Mira de precisión activada tiene un {scale=8|8}% de posibilidad de no consumir munición.

Sospecha de todos.card_desc: [Armadura] Tú y tus desplegables reciben un 20% menos de daño de los enemigos revelados por Sensor dron.

Tener a raya.card_desc: [Sensor dron] Obtienes un {scale=6|6}% de robo de vida contra enemigos revelados por Sensor dron.

Un paso adelante.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=6|6}%.

Ventaja injusta.card_desc: [Escudo deflector] Aumenta la duración de Escudo deflector en {scale=1|1}s.

Visi\u00f3n Distante.card_desc: [Sensor dron] Aumenta el alcance al que Sensor dron revela a los objetivos un {scale=10|10}%.

Ambi\u00e7\u00e3o Latente.card_desc: [Arma] Acertar um inimigo com um disparo dá {scale=12|12}% de chance de não consumir munição.

Armadilha Armada.card_desc: [Drone Sensor] Se um inimigo chegar a 6m do seu Drone Sensor, ele explode, causando repulsão e 600 de dano.

Bode Expiat\u00f3rio.card_desc: [Escudo Defletor] Enquanto o Escudo Defletor está ativo, {scale=10|10}% do dano causado a você é repassado ao Escudo.

Conting\u00eancia.card_desc: [Escudo Defletor] Aumenta a vida do Escudo Defletor em {scale=200|200}.

Controle do Ambiente.card_desc: [Mira de Precisão] Reduz o intervalo do Drone Sensor em {scale=0.06|0.06}s  para cada inimigo atingido quando a Mira de Precisão estiver ativa.

Cora\u00e7\u00e3o Saud\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Estalando o Chicote.card_desc: [Drone Sensor] Ganha {scale=6|6}% de roubo de vida ao atingir inimigos revelados pelo Drone Sensor.

Informantes.card_desc: [Drone Sensor] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} de vida ao dar o golpe fatal em um inimigo revelado pelo Drone Sensor.

Inten\u00e7\u00f5es Secretas.card_desc: [Mira de Precisão] Todos os disparos dados usando a Mira de Precisão dão {scale=8|8}% de chance de não gastar munição.

Liga Leve.card_desc: [Mira de Ferro] Ativa a Mira de Precisão {scale=15|15}% mais rápido.

Olhos no Pr\u00eamio.card_desc: [Mira de Precisão] Reduz em {scale=20|20}% o coice da sua arma enquanto estiver usando a Mira de Precisão.

Oportunidade no Caos.card_desc: [Arma] Ganha 20% mais dano após continuar disparando por 2s sem parar.

Sem Esconderijo.card_desc: [Drone Sensor] O Drone Sensor continua revelando o inimigo por {scale=1|1}s mesmo depois que o inimigo saiu do alcance do Drone.

Seriedade no Olhar.card_desc: [Drone Sensor] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% o alcance no qual o Drone Sensor revela inimigos.

Subterf\u00fagio.card_desc: [Escudo Defletor] Você se cura em {scale=20|20} de vida a cada 1s enquanto o Escudo Defletor está ativo.

Todos s\u00e3o Suspeitos.card_desc: [ Armadura] Você e seus instaláveis recebem 20% menos dano dos inimigos revelados pelo Drone Sensor

Um Passo \u00e0 Frente.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=6|6}%.

Vantagem Injusta.card_desc: [Escudo Defletor] Aumenta a duração do Escudo Defletor em {scale=1|1}s.

\u0412\u0438\u0436\u0443 \u0446\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Точный прицел] При использовании Точного прицела отдача вашего оружия снижается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u0412\u043b\u0430\u0441\u0442\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Точный прицел] Пока действует Точный прицел, попадания по врагу сокращают перезарядку Дрона-разведчика на {scale=0.06|0.06} с.

\u0412\u043e\u0437\u043c\u043e\u0436\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] После непрерывной стрельбы в течение 2 с. вы наносите на 20% больше урона.

\u0412\u0441\u0435 \u043f\u043e\u0434 \u.card_desc: [Броня] Вы и размещаемые вами объекты получаете на 20% меньше урона от врагов, раскрытых Дроном-разведчиком.

\u0413\u0440\u0443\u0441\u0442\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Дрон-разведчик] Радиус обнаружения врагов Дроном-разведчиком увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0418\u043d\u0444\u043e\u0440\u043c\u04.card_desc: [Дрон-разведчик] Нанеся смертельный удар врагу, раскрытому вашим Дроном-разведчиком, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041a\u043e\u0437\u0435\u043b \u043e\u0.card_desc: [Дефлекторный щит] Во время действия Дефлекторного щита {scale=10|10}% входящего урона переносится на него.

\u041b\u0435\u0433\u043a\u0438\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Точный прицел] Точный прицел устанавливается на {scale=15|15}% быстрее.

\u041b\u0435\u0434\u044f\u043d\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041b\u043e\u0432\u0443\u0448\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Дрон-разведчик] Если в радиусе 20 метров от Дрона-разведчика есть враг, дрон взрывается, наносит 600 ед. урона и отбрасывает его.

\u041d\u0435\u043f\u043e\u043c\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Точное попадание не расходует боеприпасы в {scale=12|12}% случаев.

\u041d\u0435\u0447\u0435\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Дефлекторный щит] Дефлекторный щит действует на {scale=1|1} с. дольше.

\u041f\u043b\u0430\u043d\u044b \u0432\u0.card_desc: [Дефлекторный щит] Пока действует Дефлекторный щит, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=20|20} ед. в секунду.

\u0421\u043a\u0440\u044b\u0442\u044b\u04.card_desc: [Точный прицел] Пока действует Точный прицел, выстрелы не расходуют боеприпасы в {scale=12|12}% случаев.

\u0421\u043f\u0440\u044f\u0442\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Дрон-разведчик] Дрон-разведчик показывает врага еще {scale=1|1} с. после того, как враг покинет его зону видимости.

\u0425\u043b\u044b\u0441\u0442.card_desc: [Дрон-разведчик] Ваши выстрелы по раскрытым Дроном-разведчиком врагам получают {scale=6|6}% вампиризма.

\u0427\u041f.card_desc: [Дефлекторный щит] Дефлекторный щит становится на {scale=200|200} ед. прочнее.

Informatorzy.card_desc: [Dron z czujnikami] Przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ za zadanie Zabójczego ciosu wrogowi ujawnionemu przez Dron z czujnikami.

Kozio\u0142 ofiarny.card_desc: [Deflektor] Gdy Deflektor jest aktywny, przejmuje {scale=10|10}% obrażeń otrzymywanych przez użytkownika.

Lekki stop.card_desc: [Dokładny celownik] Aktywuje Dokładny celownik o {scale=15|15}% szybciej.

Nie do ukrycia.card_desc: [Dron z czujnikami] Ujawnienie wroga trwa dodatkowe {scale=1|1} s po tym, jak opuści on zasięg widzenia Drona.

Nieposkromiona ambicja.card_desc: [Broń] Trafienie wroga bronią ma {scale=12|12}% szansy na niezużycie amunicji.

Nieuczciwa przewaga.card_desc: [Deflektor] Wydłuża czas działania Deflektora o {scale=1|1} s.

Oczy na nagrodzie.card_desc: [Dokładny celownik] Korzystanie z Dokładnego celownika zmniejsza odrzut o {scale=20|20}%.

Ot\u0119pia\u0142e serce.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Pu\u0142apka.card_desc: [Dron z czujnikami] Jeśli wróg znajdzie się w pobliżu 20 jedn. od twojego Drona z czujnikami, Dron eksploduje, zadając mu 600 obrażeń i odrzucając go.

Samokontrola.card_desc: [Dokładny celownik] Skraca czas odnowienia Drona z czujnikami o {scale=0.06|0.06} s za każdego trafionego wroga, kiedy Dokładny celownik był aktywny.

Smutne oczy.card_desc: [Dron z czujnikami] Zwiększa zasięg ujawniania wrogów przez Dron z czujnikami o {scale=10|10}%.

Strza\u0142 z bata.card_desc: [Dron z czujnikami] Zapewnia {scale=6|6}% kradzieży życia przeciw wrogom ujawnionym Dronem z czujnikami.

Szansa w chaosie.card_desc: [Broń] Zadajesz obrażenia większe o 20% po 2 s strzelania bez przerwy.

Ukryte rezerwy.card_desc: [Dokładny celownik] Każdy strzał bronią oddany przy użyciu Dokładnego celownika ma {scale=8|8}% szansy na niezużycie amunicji.

W planach.card_desc: [Deflektor] Przywraca ci {scale=20|20} PZ co 1 s, kiedy Deflektor jest aktywny.

Wszyscy s\u0105 podejrzani.card_desc: [Pancerz] Ty oraz twoje instalacje otrzymujecie o 20% mniej obrażeń od wrogów ujawnionych przez Drona z czujnikami.

Bubi Tuza\u011f\u0131.card_desc: [Sensör] Bir düşman, Sensör'ünün 20 birim yakınında olursa Sensör patlayarak 600 hasar verir ver geri iter.

Do\u011faya Hakimiyet.card_desc: [Hassas Nişangah] Hassas Nişangah ile vurulan her düşman için Sensör'ün Bekleme Süresi {scale=0.06|0.06}sn azalır.

F\u0131rsattan \u0130stifade.card_desc: [Silah] 2 saniye boyunca devamlı ateş edersen %2 artırılmış hasar kazanırsın.

Gizli Rezervler.card_desc: [Hassas Nişangah] Hassas Nişangah ile yapılan her atışın %{scale=8|8} Cephane harcamama şansı vardır.

G\u00f6zler \u00d6d\u00fclde.card_desc: [Hassas Nişangah] Hassas Nişangah kullanırken silahının geri tepmesini %{scale=20|20} azalt.

G\u00fcnah Ke\u00e7isi.card_desc: [Saptırıcı Kalkan] Saptırıcı Kalkan etkinken sana verilen hasarın %{scale=10|10} kadarı Kalkan'a verilir.

Hafif Ala\u015f\u0131m.card_desc: [Hassas Nişangah] Hassas Nişangah'ı %{scale=15|15} daha hızlı çıkar.

Herkesten \u015e\u00fcphelen.card_desc: [Zırh] Sen ve konuşlandırılabilirlerin, Sensör ile açığa çıkardığın düşmanlardan %20 daha az hasar alır.

Kontrols\u00fcz H\u0131rs.card_desc: [Silah] Bir silah atışı ile düşmanı vurmak %{scale=12|12} Cephane harcamama şansı verir.

Muhbir.card_desc: [Sensör] Sensör ile Açığa Çıkardığın bir düşmana Öldürücü Darbe vurduğunda {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Plan \u0130\u00e7inde Plan.card_desc: [Saptırıcı Kalkan] Saptırıcı Kalkan etkinken her 1 saniyede {scale=20|20} Can iyileş.

Saklanmak Bo\u015funa.card_desc: [Sensör] Sensör'ün Açığa Çıkarması, Açığa Çıkarma menzilinden bir düşman çıktığında {scale=1|1}sn daha sürer.

Vur K\u0131rbac\u0131.card_desc: [Sensör] Sensör'ün Açığa Çıkardığı düşmanlara karşı %{scale=6|6} Can Çalma kazan.
